forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain likely. High 13C. Winds SSE at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected. Winds could occasionally gust over 80 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. High near 55F. Winds SSE at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected. Winds could occasionally gust over 50 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and scattered thunderstorms overnight. Potential for heavy rainfall. Low 7C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain this evening...then scattered thunderstorms overnight. Potential for heavy rainfall. Low near 45F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Thunderstorms in the morning will give way to partly cloudy skies late. High 12C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Thunderstorms in the morning, then skies turning partly cloudy late. High 53F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Becoming windy late. Low 8C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Becoming windy late. Low 47F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Thundershowers and wind following a period of rain early. Potential for heavy rainfall. High 11C. Winds W at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with thundershowers and windy conditions developing in the afternoon. Potential for heavy rainfall. High 51F. Winds W at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 6C. Winds W at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 44F. Winds W at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 12C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 54F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain likely. Low 8C. Winds SSE at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with periods of rain. Low 47F. Winds SSE at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers in the morning becoming a steady rain in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 53F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low near 5C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 41F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 11C. Winds NW at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 51F. Winds NW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low near 5C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 41F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 13C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High around 55F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low 3C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 37F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine. High 13C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine. High 56F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear early then increasing cloudiness overnight. Low 3C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear evening skies will give way to mostly cloudy skies overnight. Low 37F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 14C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 4C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 39F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 58F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 42F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.
